entry.data:
SUNNY
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE UPPER 50S
NORTHEAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

CLEAR
LOWS IN THE MID 30S
SOUTHEAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH, BECOMING SOUTH AFTER MIDNIGHT

PATCHY FOG IN THE MORNING
SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 60S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

CLEAR
LOWS IN THE LOWER 40S
SOUTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH, BECOMING WEST AFTER MIDNIGHT

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 60S
EAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH, BECOMING SOUTH IN THE AFTERNOON

MOSTLY CLEAR IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 30S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF RAIN SHOWERS IN THE AFTERNOON
MUCH COOLER WITH HIGHS IN THE MID 40S
CHANCE OF RAIN 30 PERCENT

RAIN AND SNOW SHOWERS LIKELY
LITTLE OR NO SNOW ACCUMULATION
LOWS IN THE LOWER 30S
CHANCE OF PRECIPITATION 70 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF RAIN AND SNOW SHOWERS IN THE MORNING
HIGHS IN THE MID 40S
CHANCE OF PRECIPITATION 30 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF RAIN SHOWERS AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE LOWER 30S
CHANCE OF RAIN 30 PERCENT

CLOUDY WITH A 50 PERCENT CHANCE OF RAIN SHOWERS
HIGHS AROUND 50

CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE EVENING, THEN SHOWERS LIKELY AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE LOWER 40S
CHANCE OF RAIN 60 PERCENT

CLOUDY WITH A 50 PERCENT CHANCE OF SHOWERS
HIGHS AROUND 60
